description: Paranormal activity at a lush, abandoned property alarms a group eager to redevelop the site, but the eerie events may not be as unearthly as they think.

description: When Katie and Micah fear their home may be haunted by a demonic presence, Micah sets up a video camera to document all the action.

description: In 1899, a young doctor arrives at an asylum for an apprenticeship and becomes suspicious of his mentor's methods while falling for a female patient.

title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
description: After being falsely imprisoned, a vengeful murderer covers his tracks by enlisting the help of a baker whose meat pies become the toast of London.

title: Terrifier
description: On Halloween night, inside a dilapidated apartment building, Art the Clown stalks his victims, slicing and slaughtering in terrifying silence.

title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
description: A father-son team of small-town coroners performs an autopsy on an unidentified woman with mysterious injuries and a terrifying secret.

title: The Basement
description: Known for tortuous role-play with victims in his basement, a twisted serial killer abducts a musician who has a deeper connection to his mind games.

title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
description: When their parents fail to pick them up for winter break, two students stay on at an all-girls boarding school in the company of a terrible presence.

title: The Boy
description: A nanny is hired by a couple to look after their boy. She's shocked to learn that her charge is actually a doll that the couple treats like a human.

title: The Bye Bye Man
description: Three college students move into an off-campus house and discover they've unwittingly unleashed a supernatural killer known as the Bye Bye Man.

title: The Car
description: In his small Southwestern town, sheriff Wade Parent must find out who — or what — is running people down via a mysterious, driverless black sedan.

title: The Charnel House
description: After an architect transforms a slaughterhouse into trendy lofts, its new inhabitants discover that the structure is haunted by its evil past.

title: The Craft
description: At a Catholic school, a new girl falls in with a clique of teen witches who wield their powers against anyone who crosses them, even their parents.

title: The Detained
description: Five high school students serving Saturday detention in a former corrections facility must find a way to outsmart an unseen menace out to kill them.

title: The Devil Inside
description: At once spooky and grisly, this thriller follows a woman's quest to find the truth behind claims her mother killed three people during an exorcism.

title: The Diabolical
description: Terrorized by unexplained disturbances and horrific visions in her home, a young widowed mother turns to her scientist boyfriend for help.

title: The Evil Dead
description: During a stop at a remote cabin deep within the woods, a group of teens begins turning into flesh-eating zombies in director Sam Raimi's cult classic.

title: The Eyes of My Mother
description: At the remote farmhouse where she once witnessed a traumatic childhood event, a young woman develops a grisly fascination with violence.

title: The Figurine (Araromire)
description: When a pair of friends discovers a mystical sculpture in an abandoned shrine, good fortune is bestowed upon them – until luck starts running out.

title: The Golem
description: As sickness spreads throughout the countryside, an infertile woman conjures a living child out of clay and sets it loose on her enemies.

title: The Haunting of Molly Hartley
description: A troubled teenage girl hopes to start fresh at a new school, but the horrifying truth about her past is destined to catch up with her.

title: The Invitation
description: A man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, an unsettling affair that reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

title: The Last Exorcism
description: Ready to expose his miraculous deeds as mere trickery, a famed evangelist invites a documentary crew to film his final exorcism.

title: The Lodgers
description: Twin siblings live under a curse in their ancestral home, but one of them is tempted to defy house rules, angering the spirits keeping them hostage.

title: The Monster
description: A troubled mother-daughter relationship faces the ultimate test when the duo’s broken-down car leaves them trapped within reach of a vicious creature.

title: The Rezort
description: After a global zombie war, the living dead are confined to a luxury island resort and hunted by tourists on safari – until the security system fails.

title: The Rift: The Dark Side of the Moon
description: When a team of special agents is sent to recover the wreckage of a downed satellite in Serbia, their mission takes a horrifying turn.

title: The Ring
description: A reporter watches a video that supposedly sets in motion the viewer's death in seven days. Can she unravel the mystery before her own time is up?

title: The Similars
description: Stranded in a transit station one stormy night in 1968, eight strangers begin to fall victim to seizures, only to wake up disturbingly altered.

title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
description: When some friends visit a vandalized graveyard, they come upon a chainsaw-wielding maniac, and it's a fight to the bloody death between good and evil.

title: The Unborn Child
description: A couple and their young daughter are haunted by a paranormal, malicious presence – which is soon linked to a temple and a series of abortions.

title: The Vatican Tapes
description: A young woman hospitalized for an infected wound becomes possessed by a satanic force that will take a priest and two Vatican exorcists to defeat.

title: The Wedding Curse
description: Two weddings marred by tragedy lead the respective brides to believe that that they've been cursed by an old cultural superstition.

title: The Witch
description: Believing that a witch has cursed their family, pilgrims homesteading on the edge of a primeval New England forest become increasingly paranoid.

title: The Witch Files
description: A disparate group of teenage girls discovers how to obtain supernatural abilities, but abusing their newfound power has disturbing consequences.

title: Train of the Dead
description: Five teenagers on the lam hide out in an empty train. Little do they realize that the train is inhabited by ghosts on their way to final judgment.

title: Twinsanity
description: When a yoga enthusiast begins to pull away from her identical twin sister and business partner, their lifelong bond turns deadly.

title: Warda
description: When an aspiring documentarian returns to his hometown to investigate paranormal happenings, his girlfriend's mental health takes a troubling turn.

title: What Lies Beneath
description: When Claire Spencer starts hearing ghostly voices and seeing spooky images, her husband tries to reassure her by telling her it's all in her head.

title: Would You Rather
description: In need of cash to help her sick brother, a young woman agrees to take part in a lethal winner-takes-all parlor game hosted by a sadistic millionaire.
